mapper.insert: insert into board(title, content, writer) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, reg_at, mod_at, read_count from board where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, writer, reg_at, mod_at, read_count from board order by reg_at desc
mapper.update: update board set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, mod_at = now() where bno = #{bno}
